allOf.description: A particular physical business or branch of an organization. Examples of LocalBusiness include a restaurant, a particular branch of a restaurant chain, a branch of a bank, a medical practice, a club, a bowling alley, etc.
A particular physical or virtual business of an organization for medical purposes. Examples of MedicalBusiness include differents business run by health professionals.
A medical organization (physical or not), such as hospital, institution or clinic.
